PaintColor: Color used for Applying Texture Color Painting
EraseColor: Color used for Erasing Texture Color Painting
bWriteRed: Whether or not to apply Texture Color Painting to the Red Channel
bWriteGreen: Whether or not to apply Texture Color Painting to the Green Channel
bWriteBlue: Whether or not to apply Texture Color Painting to the Blue Channel
bWriteAlpha: Whether or not to apply Texture Color Painting to the Alpha Channel
UVChannel: UV channel which should be used for paint textures
bEnableSeamPainting: Seam painting flag, True if we should enable dilation to allow the painting of texture seams
PaintTexture: Texture to which Painting should be Applied
PaintBrush: Optional Texture Brush to which Painting should use
PaintBrushRotationOffset: Initial Rotation offset to apply to our paint brush
bRotateBrushTowardsDirection: Whether or not to continously rotate the brush towards the painting direction
bEnableFlow: Enables "Flow" painting where paint is continually applied from the brush every tick
bOnlyFrontFacingTriangles: Whether back-facing triangles should be ignored
